name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Security Engineer with 13+ years of experience leveraging expertise in **AWS**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and security best practices to deliver high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in implementing compliance-driven solutions that align with **SOC Compliance**, **PCI Compliance**, **ISO 27001**, and **ISO 27002** standards. Skilled in application security techniques such as **SAST** and **SCA** and performing thorough **3rd Party Assessments** to ensure robust security posture.
Strong track record in technical collaboration and document drafting, enabling seamless communication with cross-functional teams. Additionally experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms with hands-on skills in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at deploying cloud-native systems and integrating security measures throughout the software development lifecycle.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to draft technical documentation for security frameworks and assessments, ensuring clarity on compliance requirements and risk management strategies.
Conducted thorough 3rd party assessments to evaluate security risks and vulnerabilities across various technologies and platforms, enhancing the overall security posture of the organization.
Designed and executed testing strategies using tools such as Jest, Cypress, and Postman for rigorous validation of security measures, including unit, integration, and contract-level tests.
Assured data integrity and security while managing data infrastructures built with PostgreSQL and MongoDB, ensuring secure access controls and data protection.
Integrated security features into CI/CD pipelines utilizing **AWS** and **Azure DevOps**, automating security checks and compliance audits in line with industry standards.
Enhanced threat detection capabilities by deploying intelligent monitoring solutions and incident response workflows optimized for rapid detection and mitigation of security issues.
Led security awareness initiatives across teams, fostering a culture of collaboration and technical cooperation to strengthen security practices throughout the development lifecycle.

Ensured compliance with security standards by implementing best practices in **AWS** configurations, maintaining adherence to **ISO 27001** and **ISO 27002** protocols.
Conducted **3rd Party Assessments** and security audits to identify vulnerabilities in financial platforms, utilizing tools for **SAST** (Static Application Security Testing) and **SCA** (Software Composition Analysis) across applications built with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to draft and review security documentation, ensuring clarity in technical policies and procedural compliance related to **SOC Compliance** and **PCI Compliance**.

- Participated in the SOC Compliance initiatives to guarantee security monitoring meets industry standards and user trust, improving overall security readiness.
